# Frost Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 100

*Giving a forceful exhale across your cupped hand, your breath shoots forth tinged with frost and crystals of ice.*

You breathe a cone of intense cold at your foes. The spell deals 1d4 points of cold damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d4). In addition, all creatures damaged by the frost breath that fail their Reflex save are [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round by the sudden shock of cold.

*Material Component:* Three drops of water or fragments of ice (which are held in a cupped palm and blown toward the target).
